English.Text: It turns out Hannahâ€™s gut feeling was right: Madame Kahina was able to identify the symbol and link it to a dangerous New World organisation known as The Pyrphorians. Since the diary also states that your father did not unlawfully sell the island Prosperity, Hannah wants you to bring the diary to Sir Archibald Blake immediately. This might reverse the Queen's accusation of treason towards your father.
